title: (4269) 2 Storied House For Sale in Mount Lavinia, Temple Road,
details: 2 Storied House For Sale in Mount Lavinia, Temple Road, 15 Perches, With Landscaped, Garden, Ground floor Large Verandahs, Lobby, Sitting Room, Large Dining Room, Fully fitted Pantry, Domestics Kitchen, Maids Room, Drivers Quarters, 1 Floor Family Room, 4 air conditioned Bed Rooms With Attached Cable TV, Telephone, fitted wall Cupboards, Rs: 550 (Negotiable) 55 Million
